data.eml:eml: A new species of Poemenia Holmgren with a key to species known from China and the Eastern Palaearctic Region (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Poemeniinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Shu-Ping, Sheng, Mao-Ling, Chen, Tian-Lin (2017): A new species of Poemenia Holmgren with a key to species known from China and the Eastern Palaearctic Region (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Poemeniinae). ZooKeys 653: 141-149, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.653.11672, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.653.11672
